name: UIMutableApplicationShortcutItem
desc: An item that specifies a configurable user-initiated action for your app (the item is also called a mutable Home screen dynamic quick action).

items.name: var localizedTitle: String
items.desc: The required, user-visible title for the Home screen dynamic mutable quick action.

items.name: var localizedSubtitle: String?
items.desc: The optional, user-visible subtitle for the Home screen dynamic mutable quick action.

items.name: var type: String
items.desc: A required, app-specific string that you can employ to identify the type of quick action to perform.

items.name: var icon: UIApplicationShortcutIcon?
items.desc: The optional icon for the Home screen dynamic mutable quick action.

items.name: var userInfo: [String : NSSecureCoding]?
items.desc: Optional, app-specific information that you can provide for use when your app performs the Home screen dynamic mutable quick action.

items.name: var targetContentIdentifier: Any?
items.desc: The object that determines which scene handles the quick action.
